frontend.name: React 18
frontend.purpose: Render dynamic UI and manage component state for step-by-step wizard.

frontend.name: TypeScript
frontend.purpose: Provide static typing to ensure safe data flow between UI and agents.

frontend.name: Vite
frontend.purpose: Compile and bundle frontend code with fast dev tooling and optimized builds.

frontend.name: Tailwind CSS
frontend.purpose: Provide utility-first styling for consistent, rapid UI development.

frontend.name: shadcn/ui
frontend.purpose: Supply ready UI components for forms, dialogs, and wizard elements.

frontend.name: React Router
frontend.purpose: Map wizard steps to URLs and manage navigation state.

frontend.name: TanStack Query
frontend.purpose: Handle async data fetching, caching, and state synchronization.

frontend.name: TipTap
frontend.purpose: Provide in-app rich-text editing for agent-generated documents.

frontend.name: React Flow
frontend.purpose: Visualize multi-agent workflow graph and execution state.

frontend.name: Zod
frontend.purpose: Validate user inputs and agent outputs with typed schemas.

backend_and_data.name: Supabase Postgres
backend_and_data.purpose: Store projects, workflow states, document versions, and agent outputs.

backend_and_data.name: Supabase Auth
backend_and_data.purpose: Manage user authentication and secure project separation.

backend_and_data.name: Supabase Storage
backend_and_data.purpose: Persist binary deliverables such as PDFs, DOCX, and JSON files.

backend_and_data.name: Supabase Realtime
backend_and_data.purpose: Push live updates when agents finish or documents change.

backend_and_data.name: pgvector
backend_and_data.purpose: Enable semantic search and retrieval of embeddings for agent context.

backend_and_data.name: Supabase Edge Functions
backend_and_data.purpose: Execute backend logic for agent orchestration and file exports.

backend_and_data.name: Row-Level Security
backend_and_data.purpose: Enforce per-user access control on database rows.

backend_and_data.name: supabase-js
backend_and_data.purpose: Provide unified client APIs for DB, auth, storage, and functions.

ai_and_orchestration.name: LangGraph JS
ai_and_orchestration.purpose: Define and run multi-agent workflows as a directed graph.

ai_and_orchestration.name: LangChain.js
ai_and_orchestration.purpose: Manage prompts, LLM calls, retrieval, and agent tooling integration.

ai_and_orchestration.name: Ollama
ai_and_orchestration.purpose: Run local open-source LLMs for cost-free model inference.

ai_and_orchestration.name: Embedding Service (FastAPI)
ai_and_orchestration.purpose: Compute text embeddings for pgvector-based semantic search.

ai_and_orchestration.name: Parsing & Export Tools
ai_and_orchestration.purpose: Convert agent outputs into PDF, DOCX, Markdown, or structured formats.

ai_and_orchestration.name: JSON Generation & Validation Layer
ai_and_orchestration.purpose: Enforce structured JSON outputs via schemas and LLM JSON modes.

file_deliverables.name: Supabase Storage
file_deliverables.purpose: Store versioned deliverable files produced by agents.

file_deliverables.name: Postgres Version Metadata
file_deliverables.purpose: Track document versions, approvals, and change history.

file_deliverables.name: Document Diffing
file_deliverables.purpose: Compare text or JSON versions to detect changes between iterations.

file_deliverables.name: JSON Schema / Zod Validators
file_deliverables.purpose: Validate structural correctness of generated JSON deliverables.

file_deliverables.name: Export Libraries
file_deliverables.purpose: Generate output formats such as DOCX, PDF, and Markdown.

file_deliverables.name: jszip
file_deliverables.purpose: Bundle all project deliverables into downloadable ZIP archives.

file_deliverables.name: Automatic File Naming
file_deliverables.purpose: Standardize storage paths and naming for agent outputs.

infrastructure_and_devops.name: GitHub Monorepo
infrastructure_and_devops.purpose: Centralize all code for unified versioning and CI/CD.

infrastructure_and_devops.name: Supabase Hosting
infrastructure_and_devops.purpose: Host database, storage, auth, and serverless backend.

infrastructure_and_devops.name: Linux VM with Docker
infrastructure_and_devops.purpose: Host AI runtime services including LLM and embedding APIs.

infrastructure_and_devops.name: Docker
infrastructure_and_devops.purpose: Containerize AI services for reproducible and isolated deployment.

infrastructure_and_devops.name: GitHub Actions
infrastructure_and_devops.purpose: Run tests and deploy backend and AI services automatically.

infrastructure_and_devops.name: Sentry
infrastructure_and_devops.purpose: Monitor runtime errors in frontend and backend.

infrastructure_and_devops.name: PostHog
infrastructure_and_devops.purpose: Collect analytics for wizard usage and user behavior patterns.

infrastructure_and_devops.name: Central Log Aggregation
infrastructure_and_devops.purpose: Aggregate logs from agents, containers, and backend for debugging.

infrastructure_and_devops.name: Testing Stack
infrastructure_and_devops.purpose: Provide automated tests across UI, workflows, and AI microservices.

infrastructure_and_devops.name: Code Quality Tools
infrastructure_and_devops.purpose: Enforce linting, formatting, and strict type safety.

analytics_monitoring_quality.name: PostHog
analytics_monitoring_quality.purpose: Analyze user flow metrics and step completion rates.

analytics_monitoring_quality.name: Sentry
analytics_monitoring_quality.purpose: Capture agent and backend execution errors.

analytics_monitoring_quality.name: Supabase Logs
analytics_monitoring_quality.purpose: Provide backend logs for workflow and agent operations.

analytics_monitoring_quality.name: OpenSearch / Logflare
analytics_monitoring_quality.purpose: Store and query full-system logs across services.

analytics_monitoring_quality.name: Vitest
analytics_monitoring_quality.purpose: Run unit tests for UI components and shared logic.

analytics_monitoring_quality.name: Playwright
analytics_monitoring_quality.purpose: Execute end-to-end tests validating wizard flows.

analytics_monitoring_quality.name: Pytest
analytics_monitoring_quality.purpose: Test Python embedding and AI microservices.

analytics_monitoring_quality.name: ESLint + Prettier
analytics_monitoring_quality.purpose: Maintain code hygiene and formatting consistency.

analytics_monitoring_quality.name: TypeScript Strict Mode
analytics_monitoring_quality.purpose: Prevent invalid data structures across agent pipelines.
